column4: only XMMS works for me when it comes to playing mp3's. I've tried installing everything I could think of.
i've tried many different players with mp3 working, so it's possible
i tend to use 'unsupported scripts' to set up all my non-free stuff though, so i can't advise much
I'm not sure what I'm doing wrong. I've installed every package under the sun, that I know of anyway. lol. I can't play avi's either. They play, but there's sound and no video.
